EmailTemplate.subject: LOGIN INFORMATION: Tomorrow, July 19 - EMS Billing: In-house vs. Outsource
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
WEBINAR LOGIN INFORMATION Complimentary Live Webinar
EMS Billing: In-House vs. Outsource What do I need to consider?
Reminder - Tomorrow, JULY 19: live webinar with PWW Director of Reimbursement Consulting, Steve Johnson, and TriTech Industry Education Coordinator, Kathy Ransom.
Webinar Details: Join Link: http://tritech.ilinc.com/join/vfsspss Date: Tuesday, July 19, 2011 Time: 2 pm ET | 1 pm CT | Noon MT | 11 am PT Download Handouts: http://www.tritechems.com/documents/July19Webinar_Handouts.pdf Audio: listen through your computer speakers; or dial in over the telephone to a toll number on your screen when you log in
Trouble logging in? Call 800-799-4510 to the iLinc support team for help
See you online!
The TriTechTeam www.TriTechEMS.com
Share this message with colleagues or visit us at www.tritech.com
This email was sent by TriTech Software Systems
9860 Mesa Rim Road l San Diego, CA 92121
